Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஒன்றாக நல்லது கொல்லாமை மற்றதன்பின்சாரப் பொய்யாமை நன்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Alone, first of goods things, is 'not to slay'; The second is, no untrue word to say.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A great, magnificent, sunlit mountain peak represents the 'singularly best' virtue ('ஒன்றாக நல்லது'). On this highest peak stands a single, clear, radiant crystal: the virtue of Not-Killing ('கொல்லாமை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Just below this highest summit, on a slightly lower but still very high plateau, stands another, smaller crystal, representing the virtue of Not-Lying ('பொய்யாமை'). It is second in rank ('அதன் பின்சார').
Layered_Composition.Background: All other virtues are shown on the lower slopes of the mountain, clearly establishing the supreme, unparalleled position of non-violence, with truthfulness as the immediate runner-up.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A clear visual hierarchy of virtues: not-killing is the singular, supreme good, and next in rank after it comes the virtue of not-lying.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The mountain of virtues with its distinct peaks and plateaus is the central metaphor. The placement and size of the crystals representing the virtues visually communicate their rank and importance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, pure, divine light shines on the highest peak of Not-Killing. A slightly less intense, but still powerful, light illuminates the plateau of Not-Lying. The rest of the mountain is in a softer, more general light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A majestic, wide shot of the 'Mountain of Virtue', clearly showing the supreme position of the peak of Non-Killing.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic landscape, with beautiful, crystalline effects for the virtues.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Hierarchical lighting that reinforces the moral ranking.

Cultural_Anchors: The singularly good thing is not-killing (ஒன்றாக நல்லது கொல்லாமை)
